tellolib.camera

Interface ArucoMarkersInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArucoMarkers

    public interface ArucoMarkersInterface
    Convenience functions for OpenCV Aruco Markers feature.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean detectMarkers()
      Perform Aruco marker detection on the current frame held by camera, camera must be streaming.
      boolean detectMarkers(org.opencv.core.Mat frame)
      Perform Aruco marker detection on the supplied image.
      java.util.ArrayList<org.opencv.core.MatOfPoint> getMarkerContours()
      Get the contours of detected markers as an array points for each marker from the last call to detectMarkers().
      int getMarkerCount()
      Get the number of markers detected on last call to detectMarkers().
      int getMarkerId(int index)
      Get the marker id of the selected marker detected by the last call to detectMarkers().
      java.util.ArrayList<org.opencv.core.Rect> getMarkerTargets()
      Get detected markers as rectangles located within the image used in last call to detectMarkers() as x,y,h,w.

    • Method Detail

      • detectMarkers

        boolean detectMarkers(org.opencv.core.Mat frame)
        Perform Aruco marker detection on the supplied image.
        Parameters:
        frame - Image to analyze for markers.
        Returns:
        True if marker(s) detected, false if not.

      • detectMarkers

        boolean detectMarkers()
        Perform Aruco marker detection on the current frame held by camera, camera must be streaming.
        Returns:
        True if marker(s) detected, false if not.

      • getMarkerCount

        int getMarkerCount()
        Get the number of markers detected on last call to detectMarkers().
        Returns:
        Number of detected markers.

      • getMarkerId

        int getMarkerId(int index)
        Get the marker id of the selected marker detected by the last call to detectMarkers().
        Parameters:
        index - Marker to select indexed from 0.
        Returns:
        Marker id number or -1 if no markers or index out of range.

      • getMarkerTargets

        java.util.ArrayList<org.opencv.core.Rect> getMarkerTargets()
        Get detected markers as rectangles located within the image used in last call to detectMarkers() as x,y,h,w.
        Returns:
        List of target rectangles or null if no markers found.

      • getMarkerContours

        java.util.ArrayList<org.opencv.core.MatOfPoint> getMarkerContours()
        Get the contours of detected markers as an array points for each marker from the last call to detectMarkers().
        Returns:
        Array of vector of 4 corner points for each marker. Null if no markers found.
